ModMetaData.name: Stargate Weapons
ModMetaData.author: HopeSeekr,DarkShift
ModMetaData.description:
This is a real Zat Gun (Zat'nik'tel) and Staff Weapon (Ma'Tok Staff), from the Stargate Universe. For the Zat Gun, one shot stuns. Two shots kill. Rumors about the third shot are greatly exaggerated. For the Staff Weapon, it's use is to suppress enemies with terror, destroy cover, dismember your enemies, etc.
This is the perfect mod for penal colonies, mental breaks, raids, etc. May your enemies die in pain. JAFFA! KREE!
